title: Promoting Climate Smart Agricultural Initiatives in Cambodia

tasks.task: Understand the impact of climate change on Cambodian agriculture.
subtasks: Note the worsening impacts, such as intense rainfall, high temperatures, and sea-level rise.
Identify affected regions, like Prai Veng province, and the resulting economic losses.
Recognize the livelihood vulnerability of farmers in Cambodia.

tasks.task: Assess the strategic program for climate resilience.
subtasks: Note support from the Asian Development Bank and the pilot program.
Identify the seven investment projects and one technical assistance project.
Understand the project's overall objectives, such as climate resilience support.
Identify two investment projects related to agriculture.
Describe the Climate Resilience Rice Commercialization Sector Development Project.
Explain rehabilitation and climate-proofing of irrigation systems and infrastructure.
Describe engineering measures to handle rapid floodwater flows.

tasks.task: Analyze specific agricultural practices and technologies.
subtasks: Note the use of laser land leveling to conserve water and improve irrigation efficiency.
Recognize the提及的种子认证系统及其提高作物抗逆性的作用。
Identify the pilot testing of weather-indexed crop insurance schemes.
Explain the aim to reduce climate-related risks in rice production.

tasks.task: Evaluate social benefits of the project.
subtasks: Note the improvement in seed quality and availability.
Acknowledge the creation of more job opportunities for women.
Assess overall contributions to economic, social, and environmental sustainability in rice farming.
